segments.text: John , it ’ s time to get up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can ’ t be time to get up yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is . Hurry up ! You ’ ll be late for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s nearly half past seven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s slow . Hurry up ! The bus goes at twenty to eight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure half past seven ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Positive . I ’ ll put the radio on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s only seven o ’ clock . Your watch is fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn ’ t . It ’ s stopped . I forgot to wind it up last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could have stayed in bed for another half hour .
segments.speaker: S2
